Text: LSU Team Kick off MeetingPST Greetings All Attached is a complete listing of all the confirmed event dates and the number of participants needed for each event Please let me know as soon as possible which recruiting event you desire to participate in as we are attempting to finalize the recruiting plans The LSU Team Kick off meeting will be held Thursday August th from pm pm Brenda Herod as graciously agreed to serve as the LSU Team Lead Come learn how you can add value Marble Slab will cater the event Regards Valarie Barnes Associate Analyst Program x

LSU RecruitingAfter careful review the LSU recruiting effort has been changed from a broad based effort to a Direct Strategy The recruiting process will be based on direct strategy real time needs The Associate and Analyst program will continue to have a presence at LSU If you were scheduled to attend an event at this university please contact Valarie Barnes for additional assistance Again thank you for your continued support of the Associate Analyst program Valarie Barnes Recruiter x
